# Determinant ğ“  ğ“ˆ–
Originally ğ“  ğ“ˆ– was maybe just a determinant like "number" or "remainder" however as the ğ“‹´ part of eight became more and more corroded or ambivalent, it became necessary custom to persistently add ğ“  ğ“ˆ– in order to avoid confusion with many other words that sounded like ğ“‹´.  

Al-Ashmunayn Ashmunein Ashmounein ğ„ğ“…±ğ“Œğ“Š–ğ“ "City of the Eight / Ogdoad" Ï¢â²™â²Ÿâ²©â²› Shmun ğ“‹‰ Khemenu á¸«mnw Hermoâ¿polis

Since ğ“‹´ ğ“  ğ“ˆ– is so strongly associated with ğ“  ğ“ˆ– ğ“ƒ’ the deep semantic relationship of  
ğ“‹´ ğ“  ğ“ˆ– is probably 2*4 or 4*2, since ğ“  ğ“ˆ– ğ“ƒ’ mammals only have four legs.  

What does a beast ğ“  ğ“ˆ– ğ“ƒ’ á´½ have to do with number 8 in a pantheon context?  
Maybe it was the 8th cosmic entitiy after the 5 known planets plus sun and moon.  
But what was it?
